hero.headline: Your Local Property Maintenance Experts
hero.subheadline: Reliable and affordable services including carpentry, flooring, painting, tiling, garden maintenance and more.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At L.M.P Property Services, we take pride in offering a wide range of home improvement and maintenance services. Whether you're refreshing a single room or renovating an entire property, our skilled team is here to help. With free quotes, competitive pricing, and a passion for quality, we’re your go-to local choice.

items.title: Carpentry
items.description: Custom woodwork, framing, repair, and installation of doors, skirting, and more.

items.title: Tiling
items.description: Wall and floor tiling services for bathrooms, kitchens, and living spaces.

items.title: Painting & Decorating
items.description: Interior and exterior painting, feature walls, wallpapering, and decorative finishes.

items.title: Flat Pack Assembly
items.description: Efficient furniture assembly for home and office – we bring the tools.

items.title: Flooring
items.description: Laminate, vinyl, hardwood or carpet tile installation with expert finish.

items.title: Fascia & Soffits
items.description: Repair or replace fascia boards, soffits, and guttering for a clean exterior.

items.title: Plastering
items.description: Smooth skim finishes, patch repairs, drylining, and full-room re-plastering.

items.title: Garden Maintenance
items.description: General tidy-ups, waste removal, and fence repairs to improve outdoor spaces.

items.title: Skilled Trades
items.description: All work completed by experienced professionals who take pride in their craft.

items.title: Free Quotes
items.description: No obligation, no hidden fees — just straightforward pricing and clear communication.

items.title: Fully Insured
items.description: Work is carried out with public liability insurance to ensure peace of mind.

items.question: Do you offer free quotes?
items.answer: Yes — we offer free, no-obligation quotes across all services.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We work across Bedfordshire and surrounding regions — just ask if you're unsure.

items.question: Can you help with multiple small jobs?
items.answer: Of course! We regularly handle handyman-style jobs as well as larger renovations.
